sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { User, Lock, Bell, ShieldCheck, Save, Camera, Globe, Palette, Smartphone, CreditCard, Link as LinkIcon, HelpCircle, Mail, MoreVertical, Database, Eye, Github, Chrome, Share2, HardDrive, Zap } from "lucide-react"; interface SettingItemProps { icon: React.ElementType; title: string; description: string; children: React.ReactNode; } const SettingSection: React.FC = ({ icon: Icon, title, description, children }) => (

{title}

{description}

{children}
); const ToggleSwitch: React.FC<{ active: boolean; label: string }> = ({ active, label }) => (
{label}
); const IntegrationItem: React.FC<{ icon: React.ElementType; name: string; status: string; connected: boolean }> = ({ icon: Icon, name, status, connected }) => (

{name}

{status}

); const SettingsPage: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Header */}

System Settings

Configure your global account and application preferences.

 {/* Profile Section */}
AK

Your Photo

Upload a high-quality picture (max 5MB).

 {/* Localization Settings */}
{/* Security & Access */}
Currently Disabled
{/* Integrations (NEW) */}
{/* Privacy & Appearance (NEW) */}

Themes

 {/* Storage & Usage (NEW) */}
Workspace Usage 4.2 GB of 10 GB
Clear cache & temporary files
{/* Advanced Features (NEW) */}
); }; export default SettingsPage;
